title: Slug Bicycles and Outer Shell Mini Saddle Bag
content:
Slug Bicycles just announced its first product in collaboration with the brand’s good friends at Outer Shell. The San Francisco bike company adapted Outer Shells’ iconic Mini Saddle Bag ($45) to match the brushed finish of its frames. The Saddle Bag is constructed using Challenge Sailcloth UltraGridTM in Cool Grey and a Slug-branded Voile strap.

In stock and shipping from San Francisco today.

Specs:

  • Made in The Mission, SF, CA
  • 15” Slug Voile Strap included
  • Main body fabric – weather-resistant 210D UltraGrid fabric
  • Liner fabric – 10 oz. vinyl coated polyester
  • 5″ x 2″ x 2″
  • Weight: 2.5 oz.
  • MSRP: $45

See more at Slug Bicycles.

The post Slug Bicycles and Outer Shell Mini Saddle Bag appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
